name: Final Return - Space Station Building Game
name_original: Final Return - Space Station Building Game
description:
Enjoy this epic space builder where you can construct a space station to call your own. 

Made using Unreal Engine in 48 Hours for the TimDred Game Jam. 

Important things to keep in mind

  • There is currently no save or load functionality in the game!

Control Tips!

  • [Middle mouse] + [Mouse Movement] will pan camera
  • In build mode, adjust the Pitch, Roll and Yaw by scrolling the scroll wheel while holding down [Shift] and/or [Ctrl]
    ( Eg: [Ctrl] + [Scroll Up]  or [Ctrl] + [Shift] + [Scroll down]).
  • Shoot Asteroids to get more resources!
  • [Alt] + [MiddleClick] will reset camera,
  • While building, [Alt] will remove snapping grid

Assets used were sourced from unreal engine learn content, free assets in unreal engine marketplace, sketchfab, flaticon, freesound.
